file_content.text: Like I promised, sir. The Jedi won't be a problem anymore. Now your master won't mind about those other Noetikons, right?
He might not, only it seems your plan was a failure.
What the--? B--but look! She's weaker, it did work!
What the--? B--but look! He's weaker, it did work!
Pain is nothing. We still stand.
I would've preferred if our little trap had killed you.
Not that it mattered--the Noetikons are nothing on their own anyway. They wouldn't have stopped me or my master.
What? You're alive? How could anyone have survived--!
Is not for you to kill Scorekeeper's Herald.
You think you're pretty clever, but the Noetikons aren't enough to stop me or my master.
Are you the one who's making Yuon ill?
Are you behind all this?
Yuon? Is that her name? Her weak mind already bows to my master, just as you all will.
Who's your master, Sith?
Your master?
My master is the downfall of the Jedi Order.
You and your master are irrelevant. I will cure Yuon Par.
Yuon is all that matters.
It's too late for your Master. She crumbles as we speak.
Baddeg, what are you waiting for? Earn my master's forgiveness--kill this wretch.
You got what you asked for, Jedi.
You've got guts, Jedi. Walking into my base. Stealing two of my Noetikons.
Those Noetikons were looted from the Jedi Temple.
They belong to the Jedi.
There are three Noetikons, Baddeg. I know you have the last one.
Where is the third?
What are you planning to do with the Noetikons? Sell them?
I want answers, Baddeg.
They're bargaining chips. My bargaining chips.
You've messed everything up. They said I could rule the Justicar territory if I got them the Noetikons. Just one left, and it's theirs.
Who are you talking about?
Who is "they"?
Doesn't matter. This is my only chance.
Whoever "they" are, if you give me the Noetikon, I'll make sure they don't hurt you.
I can protect you from them.
Like you can help me.
Is fool's way to rely on others for strength.
Agh. I already lost two Noetikons--I'm a dead man anyway. Here. Take it.
You can keep the Noetikon, or walk away from this. Not both.
Give it to me. Now.
Fine. Take it!
This whole thing was a mistake from the start.
